name: NPR
text:
The new HBO film "Coastal Elites" is an explosion of emotion about life in 2020, told in five monologues filmed during quarantine. Our critic says not all of the parts work well — but it's worth a watch for the ones that do.
https://t.co/ro0NPVlgW4

name: NPR
text:
Opinion: @nprscottsimon recounts what life in California — once the stuff of dreams — has become for too many residents, as wildfires, mudslides, earthquakes seem to happen with increasing frequency.  
 https://t.co/R3qkHc9zO8
